definition: (classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: But today’s chubby Santa is not about giving to the poor.
sentences.chinese: 但是今天胖乎乎的聖誕老人不會給窮人孩子禮物。

sentences.english: Its swaddle wraps and unwraps , a red Plumpness , more apples of autumn on the boughs .
sentences.chinese: 胖乎乎的粉嫩潤紅，還有許多秋果掛在枝頭。

sentences.english: She is beginning to plump out now.
There is a fat worm living in this planet.
sentences.chinese: 在蘋果星球裏，住着一條胖乎乎的肉蟲子。

sentences.english: Two Chinese pugs were sniffing here and there on the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 兩隻胖乎乎的巴哥犬在地上嗅來嗅去。

sentences.english: He had twined his chubby arms around Vincent's neck.
sentences.chinese: 他胖乎乎的雙臂摟住文森特的脖子。

sentences.english: Two chubby Chinese pugs were sniffing here and there on the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 兩隻胖乎乎的巴哥犬在地上嗅來嗅去。

sentences.english: There is a fat pregnant cat who sneaks into my garage.
sentences.chinese: 有一隻胖乎乎要下崽的貓躲進了我的車庫。

sentences.english: There was a small, fat black mahogany elephant in it.
sentences.chinese: 打開包，裏面是一個胖乎乎的黑紅木雕小象。

definition: variant of 肉乎乎[rou4 hu1 hu1]
robust and prosperous (a compliment in former times)/fat person (modern)
